statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic = 'Safety Training'
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 123 AND training_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Advanced%';
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe' AND training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE training_type = 'Onboarding' AND completion_status = 'Incomplete';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND position = 'Developer';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT');
DELETE FROM departments WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE department_name = 'HR');
DELETE FROM training_programs WHERE trainer = 'John Doe';
